plot: Disguised as clerks, two young Americans slip into a sleepy Mexican village where they are caught by a ruthless band of bikers and turned into slaves to help with their harvesting of drug crops.
title: Warlords of Hell
plot_es: Disguised as clerks, two young Americans slip into a sleepy Mexican village where they are caught by a ruthless band of bikers and turned into slaves to help with their harvesting of drug crops.
plot_en: Disguised as clerks, two young Americans slip into a sleepy Mexican village where they are caught by a ruthless band of bikers and turned into slaves to help with their harvesting of drug crops.
